product_name: REI Classic Duffel Bag - X Large
long_description: Big and burly, our X Large REI Classic duffel bag doles out more than 5,500 cu. in. of gear-swallowing space and tucks away in a convenient, compact storage pouch when not in use. Urethane-coated 1,000-denier nylon is highly water resistant and very tough; dual zippers facilitate easy access into main compartment. Wrap-around 2 in. nylon webbing handles support the load. Tote duffel bag comfortably with the adjustable shoulder strap, included. Convenient storage sack doubles as a toiletry bag.
short_description: Big and burly, our X Large REI Classic duffel bag doles out more than 5,500 cu. in. of gear-swallowing space and tucks away in a convenient, compact storage pouch when not in use.
